content.body: CyanChanges: HMR is specifically one of the cases I hope motivates a Module constructor and possibly even Evaluators
content.formatted_body: CyanChanges: HMR is specifically one of the cases I hope motivates a Module constructor and possibly even Evaluators

content.body: It would at least let you create a virtual cache that overshadows the host ESM cache

> <@kriskowal:aelf.land> It would at least let you create a virtual cache that overshadows the host ESM cache

Well, won't that cause memory leak?

In reply to @kriskowal:aelf.land
It would at least let you create a virtual cache that overshadows the host ESM cache
Well, won't that cause memory leak?
